Question: The Rawhide years (1959–65) were some of the most grueling of this person's career.
Hints: With a production cost of $20 million, (US$47.6 million in 2013 dollars) it was this person's highest budget film to date.
In the show's first season this person earned $750 (US$5,968 in 2013 dollars) an episode.
In 1995, this person questioned the purpose of assault weapons.
